thread.title: Transocean Seeks to Cancel Two Dividend Payments
thread.title_full: Transocean Seeks to Cancel Two Dividend Payments - WSJ

author: Josh Beckerman
title: Transocean Seeks to Cancel Two Dividend Payments
text:
Transocean Ltd. is seeking to cancel the third and fourth installments of its dollar-denominated dividend this year, which the company had already approved in May.
Shares dropped 12% to $10.75 in after-hours trading. Through Tuesdayâ€™s close, they had fallen 67% in the past 12 months.
